text:
Since the z/OS Mainframe does not use an ASCII-based charset, Telnet to the
Appender results in unreadable Characters (EBCDIC). 
The problem can be solved, if you change the following line in the run() method:

          PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(newClient.getOutputStream()); 
to 
          PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(new
OutputStreamWriter(newClient.getOutputStream(),"8859_1")); 

I tried it and it works for me.
creator: joerg_rausch@idg.de
